item.title: Cooking up some more CVEs
item.description: Unlike state secrets, I don’t want my brisket recipes to wind up in a Florida bathroom As a follow up to the last time I wrote about CVEs, I’ve amassed a few more to my name: CVE-2024-29191 CVE-2024-29192 CVE-2024-29193 CVE-2024-31991 CVE-2024-31992 CVE-2024-31993 CVE-2024-31994 The first three of these are related to go2rtc and are follow-ups from the earlier investigation done with Frigate. These were found in collaboration with Jorge Rosillo from GitHub Security Lab, and I recommend taking a read through the advisory article for details on these.
